Async class

{% raw %}

Async[source]

Async(func:Callable)

JS style async tool def download_file(url): ... return path

download_async = Async(download_file)

download_async(url) .then(lambda x: os.system(f"tar -xvf {path}")) .catch(logging.error)

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

JS style async

{% raw %} 
def slow_func(x):
    """took long calc"""
    if x>0:
        for i in range(x):
            slow_func(x-1)
    return x
{% endraw %}

Creating async version of the function

{% raw %} 
slow_func_async = Async(slow_func)
{% endraw %}

Testing async

{% raw %} 
%%time
slow_func_async(10)\
.then(lambda x:f">> input x is:{x}")\
.then(print)\
.catch(print)

print(">> print from another task")

>> print from another task
CPU times: user 104 µs, sys: 5 µs, total: 109 µs
Wall time: 113 µs
>> input x is:10
{% endraw %}
